page.description: The {SIZE} command sets the width of the dialog, using the units specified in the {UNITS} command.

argument.name: Width
argument.description: Numeric. The width of the dialog in the units of the measure (the default is inches).

argument.name: Name
argument.description: Character. A reference name to use in storing and retrieving the size information.

section.title: Example
section.description: This example sets the width of a dialog.
You can also retrieve and set the size previously stored with the {size=remember=name} command.
